S4.T2.caption:
Table 2 :  Quantitative comparison with NeRF-based methods. The  best  and the  second best  results are highlighted.
Our S 3 D-NeRF holds competitive image quality and audio-visual consistency, meanwhile the best generalize ability.

S4.T3.caption: Table 3 :  Quantitative ablation study. The full S 3 D-NeRF achieves the best landmark distance and lip synthesis results, with a little sacrifice on image quality.
